task.title: Generate Usage Reports
task.shortdesc: This section shows you how to generate usage reports using the Eucalyptus Dashboard.

context.draft-comment: Let's think about adding a concept for reports: Chargeback/Showback reports–Enforce usage based on historical information–Generate usage reports–Link chargeback to billing system
context.p: Eucaluptus reports are generated in the Dashboard. To generate reports:

step.cmd: Log in to the Dashboard at https://<your_frontend_hostname_or_ipaddress>:8443.
Click Usage Report in the Quick Links section.
In the Start date field, select the date to start

taskbody.result: The usage report displays, reflecting your choices in the report.
